quest.name: A Mother's Love
journal: Ameliance is eager to depart for the Studium.
objectives: Speak with Ameliance and have her accompany you.
Accompany Ameliance to the designated location and then speak with her.
Speak with the contemplative student while accompanied by Ameliance.
Accompany Ameliance to the designated location and then speak with her.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Lest you worry, I've informed Meryld to wait here in case Mila returns home before we find her.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: With that, let us be off. Oh, I can scarcely wait to see the look on her face when we arrive.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: I offered to escort Miss Miladeen here, but Lady Ameliance refused. I fear her unexpected arrival may prove overly stressful for our young charge. Please look after them both in my absence, would you?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Custom deliveries cannot be made while this quest is in progress. They will become available again once the quest is completed.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Is it strange that, having come all this way, I only now begin to have second thoughts about my plan to surprise Mila? Surely, she would be glad to see us. More so, I should think, if she were to see you in the lead.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: You are far too kind. Thank you.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Phenomenon is where she's most likely to be, so I suggest we start there.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ameliance is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Ameliance behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Ameliance accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Part ways with Ameliance.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Is something the matter? If you're hungry, I could have our attendants at the manor prepare something on our return.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Ameliance?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Other worldly matters demand your attention, I take it. Say no more. When you return, I shall await you here at the Studium.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Ah, you've returned. I trust everything is all right? Wonderful. Then let us resume our search for Mila!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I should have known she would not be here. There is rarely an opportunity to remain idle at the Studium, after all. She did mention some manner of practical training today, however. Perhaps we can find her at Makers' Meet. Or, failing that, we can ask if any students have seen her.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...But my, how wonderful it is to walk through these halls again. So many fond memories. Perhaps you would care to hear a story or two?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss the Studium.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss the various faculties.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: It was the twins' graduation when last I was here. Unfortunately, an emergency Forum meeting prevented Fourchenault from attending.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I'd never seen Alisaie in such a foul mood. Alphinaud, meanwhile, tried to put on a brave face, saying he understood the demand and duty of the Forum... But a mother knows when her children are hurting.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Fourchenault was no better. Would that you could have seen it. He spent an entire day with Alphinaud in the kitchen, baking batch after batch of ginger cookies for Alisaie in an amusing attempt to cheer her up.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: As a student, my studies here centered on the arcane. Fourchenault, meanwhile, studied the art of somanoutics─a dreadfully difficult discipline undertaken by those who aspire to become sages.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: One fateful day, he and I found ourselves working together on an experiment. I had never worked closely with him before, but I knew him well by reputation.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...He was said to be unbelievably cantankerous, stubborn, unapproachable, and overall quite insufferable─all of which turned out to be true. Naturally, I wished to learn everything about him!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: He was always so flustered whenever we spoke, averting his eyes this way and that. It was all so very amusing and peculiar─to even think of it begs for laughter! ...Ahem, 'tis probably best that we keep this conversation between ourselves.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: Thaliak give me strength, I can't think of a way to frame my research! Perhaps I'd best schedule another meeting with the professor...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ameliance must be accompanying you in order to proceed with the quest.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: I'm sorry...did you need something?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Please forgive us our intrusion. Would you perchance happen to know where we can find Miladeen? She's a student newly arrived from Thavnair.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Ah, but how rude of me! I am her host mother, Ameliance Leveilleur.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: Ameliance... L-Leveilleur!?

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: Y-Yes, of course! Miladeen! She's in the same course as me. She usually heads over to the pavilion by Noumenon to study on her own after class!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Perfect! She shan't be hard to find, then. My apologies again for the disturbance.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: N-No problem at all! It was an honor to meet you, milady!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: We've no time to lose─let us make for the pavilion near Noumenon!

dialogue.name: RESEARCHSTUDENT04524
dialogue.text: Miladeen is really fond of that pavilion─there's nary a day I don't see her studying there.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss Noumenon.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: You wish to know about Noumenon? Oh, there's not much to tell of those dusty old halls, though I suppose they are not without a memorable moment or two. I once ventured there in the dead of night for some last-minute research─the deadline for my thesis was close at hand, you see.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: The corridors were dark and empty, with naught but the soft echo of my footsteps to keep me company.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Then suddenly, a shadowy phantom appeared before me, as if from the very void itself!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Much to my surprise, a phantom...it was not. Nay, 'twas Fourchenault. Under the veil of his Vanish spell, he'd been sneaking around the forbidden archives.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Gods, the look on his face! He near died from embarrassment. “Speak of this to no one, I beg you!” he cried. I obliged, but on the condition he take me to dinner.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...I trust you understand he's not to hear a word of this conversation.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: There she is! But...she doesn't quite seem herself.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Mila?

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: L-Lady Ameliance? And Forename as well? Oh no, is something wrong?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Not at all, my dear, everything is quite all right. Forename and I merely wished to check on you. It is getting rather late, after all. You must be famished!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Oh... I'm sorry for making you worry. I just got so absorbed in what I was doing...

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I take it you've been using the mammet there to practice your healing?

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Yes...but to be perfectly honest, it hasn't been going well.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: The mammet is designed specifically to respond to healing magicks. Rather than risk the danger of practice on a living patient, students use puppets such as this. When a spell is successful, the mammet will rise to its feet.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...Observe.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: A-Amazing...!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Lady Ameliance, that was simply incredible! Such grace and precision─without expending even an onze of excess energy. It was...

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: It was absolutely perfect... Yet no matter what I do, the mammet refuses to even move.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I've been trying so hard to prove my mother wrong, but maybe she was right. Maybe I never should've convinced myself that I could master healing magicks...

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I...I came all this way, and accomplished nothing. You've been so kind to me, Lady Ameliance, and I don't want to waste any more of your precious time. Perhaps it'd be best if I returned home...

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Nothing could be further from the truth. You think so too, don't you?

dialogue.name: DUMMYMAMMET04524
dialogue.text: YeS, tHaT iS sImPlY nOt TrUe! PlEaSe ChEeR uP, mIlA!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Whoa! Erm...are you making it speak, Lady Ameliance?

dialogue.name: DUMMYMAMMET04524
dialogue.text: PaReNtS aRe AlWaYs ThInKiNg Of ThEiR cHiLdReN. yOuR mOtHeR sUrElY wAnTs ThE bEsT fOr YoU.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I...I know that. I do, truly. That's why I'm afraid of disappointing her.

dialogue.name: DUMMYMAMMET04524
dialogue.text: YoU aRe NoT a PuPpEt. YoU nEeD nOt DaNcE tO yOuR mOtHeR's TuNe!

dialogue.name: DUMMYMAMMET04524
dialogue.text: YoU hAvE dEtErMiNaTiOn, PaSsIoN, aNd A wOnDeRfUl DrEaM!

dialogue.name: DUMMYMAMMET04524
dialogue.text: BeSiDeS, aLwAyS dOiNg As OnE iS tOlD iS nOt EaSy. TaKe It FrOm Me─I'm An ExPeRt!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Bahahaha! That's hardly something to brag about!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: There's the darling smile I've come to admire.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Mila, there is no doubt in my mind that a brilliant, hardworking young lady like yourself would make a fine alchemist.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Your mother surely saw the same, and simply wished for you to walk an easier path─a path where your success would be assured.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: But with great resolve and determination, you fought to pursue your own way forward. This is part of what it means to become an adult.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: After a child strikes out on their own, a mother can only pray they find happiness...

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I... I know not what to say...

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Perhaps a light stroll might help me to collect my thoughts before I make any rash decisions.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Then we shall take a leisurely walk back to the estate. I would much rather hear your decision once we are returned─you're like to come down with something if you stay outdoors overlong!

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Welcome back. If you've worked up an appetite, you will be pleased to hear that the head chef is presently preparing a most exquisite Thavnairian stew.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I'm sorry for making you worry! And, thank you.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I've decided... I'm going to finish what I started! If there came a day when a life I could have saved was lost because I gave up now, I'd never be able to forgive myself.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: But more than that...I want to repay the support and kindness you both have shown me. I want to make you proud! That is, if you will still have me...?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Oh, come now, you hardly need ask. You shall ever be welcome here, Mila, and have our unwavering support.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Have you any sage counsel for our aspiring weaver of magicks here?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: If worse comes to worst, you always have your fists!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Practice makes perfect.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You must have a sympathetic heart to those in need of succor.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: An unshakable will is key.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: ...N-No way, punching things is out of the question! Ohhh, wait, I see. You're saying a strong mind requires a strong body! One cannot hope to refine their magicks without the fortitude to do so, after all!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I see. No shortcuts, just hard work...drilling over and over until wielding magic feels like second nature. I will do my best, and follow your example!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: A sympathetic heart...a shoulder for those in need to lean on. I want to become someone like that...like you!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: An unshakable will... You're right, I need to believe in myself, and stand firm in my conviction. Only then I can walk the path towards mastery with my head held high!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: One last word of advice, from a former student of the Studium.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Set aside practicing healing incantations for the time being, and focus solely on manipulating the mammet.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Magic is the power to convert one's aether into tangible phenomena. The key is to visualize precisely what it is you wish to bring forth.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I believe your problem stems from the lack of a solid image in your mind's eye. When picturing the act of “healing,” what do you envision?

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I-I don't know, really... I've been so caught up with trying to perfect the technique, I hadn't given it any thought.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Then focusing on manipulating the mammet may be just what you need. You can concentrate on clear images like making it walk, run, or sit.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: With enough practice and repetition, more abstract concepts─such as the inner workings of healing a wound─should become easier to conceive.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I-I see! The whole process just seemed so complex, that I... But that's in the past. From now on, I'm going to focus on visualizing everything, step by step!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! But do take care not to push yourself too hard. For now, I think a hot bowl of soup is precisely what you need. It's a Thavnairian recipe, so I hope it offers a taste of home.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I cannot thank you enough for accompanying me today. ...I admit, I may have lost track of time in all the excitement.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Now then, if Mila and the other students are to continue their training, I believe it prudent we prepare a new set of mammets. Those of cruder make are more troublesome to manipulate, and thus I must ask that you fashion aetheroconductive units to replace them.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: With a mammet of good quality, Mila should be able to grasp how to manipulate her aether rather quickly─and I shall be beside her, ready to help at every turn.
